features: 【Convenient Cosmetic Brush Cleaner】While you are still worrying about your makeup brush can not be well cleaned after use,we can now provide you a best solution for you to clean them and free you from all the worries and troubles.

【Electric Makeup Brush Cleaner】Our electric cosmetic brush cleaner adopts advanced and newest technology which can provide a powerful but soft and gentle brush cleaning so that it can protect your brush from getting hurt when using.
【Compact And Portable】With its sleek and compact design, our automatic spinning makeup brush cleaner is both portable and aesthetically pleasing.

【Widely used】Electric Makeup Brush Cleaner is compatible with a wide range of makeup brushes, regardless of their size or shape. From small eye shadow brushes to larger powder brushes, it tackles them all with ease.

【Easy to Use】Automatic brush cleaner is powered by USB,kindly be informed that the adapter should be above 5V 2A .For load protection, you are supposed to give the cleaner at 15 minutes rest after every to extend the service life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little washer is amazing. I was surprised on how clean my brushes and sponges were after using this. I had not cleaned my stuff in months because I was too lazy to clean them by hand. Because of this I had to run a couple of brushes twice but no big deal. I used my hand soap to clean them and they came out nice and fluffy. Dried over night. If washing by hand they would take days to dry because they were not fully clean. When cleaning the brushes with this washer the brushes were dried over night. When washing the sponges I would recommend filling the water below the max fill line. If you are using hand soap to wash them then one or two pumps is more than enough soap. Do not let the price fool you. There are others just like this for $20 to $30 but I did not have a problem. Also, the only complaint I have is that the power cord is a USB-A so make sure you have a charging block with this end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars where has this been all of my life!
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to get this to make brush cleaning easier and faster. However I followed the directions, it worked for 1 second and then stopped working so I am sending back for a replacement and will update when getting the replacement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Some limitations, so not all that I expected, but ok for the price
reviews.reviewText: Well, I am glad that I chose this one over some others based on price, because if I had paid the double price they were asking for essentially the same thing, I would be upset.As for the automated option, the section that "holds" the brushes will only hold thinner stemmed brushes, so I literally could only wash my eyeshadow brushes automatically. All of my other brushes have handles that are too thick. This just means that I have to hold them in the machine myself while it is running. not the worst, but not the "set it and forget it" that I was looking forward to--It's still better than hardly ever washing them at all, so I will take it-- plus, I only paid 9.99.That said, that also means I cannot use it to store or dry most of my brushes--so it is pretty much a uni-tasker (it agitates water so that I can clean my brushes more quickly with solution and water. period.)Also, no mention in the instructions for what I am supposed to do with the extra silicone pad with grooves. I assume from pictures of other products that I can rub my brush against it to help loosen product

reviews.reviewerName: John patrick james patterson IIIJohn patrick james patterson III
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a good job!
reviews.reviewText: So I was skeptical wondering why this one was cheaper but baby this thing works! It made washing my makeup brushes so easy. I put the hottest water from my sink with some dawn dish soap and let it run a few times with fresh water until the water was clear. Then I used it to rinse the brushes and get all the soap out. The directions said to dry them in the same position you clean them in after using a towel to soak up any excess water. They are facing up for storage after being completely dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Possible future purchase
reviews.reviewText: Don’t go by the directions you don’t want to stand your brushes up right to dry it will get the glue wet that hold it glue to the ferrule in your brushes. Hang them upside down or lay flat.
